string.name: app_about
string.translation_description: A brief description of the app, for use in the About dialog.

resources.string: TabsLite is a free, open source guitar tablature app with over a million songs available using existing popular tabs databases. It\'s built for speed and simplicity, 100% free with no ads. Managed by More Than Solitaire, Inc, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to software learning.

string.name: app_action_export_playlists
string.translation_description: The button text to export playlists

string.name: app_action_import_playlists
string.translation_description: The button text to export playlists

string.name: app_action_leave_review
string.translation_description: The button text to leave a review

string.name: app_action_donate
string.translation_description: The button text to donate to TabsLite

string.name: app_action_search
string.translation_description: The placeholder text for the search bar

string.name: app_action_description_search
string.translation_description: The accessibility text for the Search action

string.name: app_action_description_create_playlist
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for Create Playlist button

string.name: app_icon_description_half_star
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for a half star icon

string.name: app_icon_description_filled_star
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for a full star icon

string.name: theme_selection_system
string.translation_description: Title of the theme option that means use dark mode when the phone is set to dark mode, and light when the phone is set to light mode. This is the default theme option.

string.name: theme_selection_light
string.translation_description: Title of the theme option that means use light mode regardless of system setting.

string.name: theme_selection_dark
string.translation_description: Title of the theme option that means use dark mode regardless of system setting.

string.name: theme_selection_title
string.translation_description: Label shown next to the theme selection dropdown

string.name: title_favorites_playlist
string.translation_description: The title of the Favorites playlist/home tab

string.name: title_popular_playlist
string.translation_description: The title of the Popular playlist/home tab

string.name: title_playlists_page
string.translation_description: The title of the Playlists home tab

string.name: title_add_to_playlist_dialog
string.translation_description: The title of the Add To Playlist dialog

string.name: title_create_playlist_dialog
string.translation_description: Title for the Create Playlist dialog

string.name: title_create_song
string.translation_description: Title for the Create Song screen

string.name: placeholder_playlist_title
string.translation_description: Placeholder text for Playlist Title entry field

string.name: placeholder_playlist_description
string.translation_description: Placeholder text for Playlist Description entry field

string.name: playlist_empty_description
string.translation_description: The description shown on the playlist screen for an empty playlist with no songs added

resources.string: Add songs to your playlist by finding the song you\'d like and selecting the three dot menu at the top right of the screen.

string.name: select_playlist_dialog_no_selection
string.translation_description: The playlist text shown when there's no playlist selected in the Add To Playlist dialog. This can happen when no playlists have been created yet.

string.name: empty_favorites
string.translation_description: The text shown on the Favorites page when no songs have been favorited

resources.string: Select the heart icon on any song to save it offline in this list.

string.name: empty_popular
string.translation_description: The text shown on the Popular page when no popular songs have been loaded from the internet (yet).

resources.string: Today\'s popular songs will load when you\'re connected to the internet.

string.name: capo_zero
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is not used

string.name: capo_11
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 11

string.name: capo_12
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 12

string.name: capo_13
string.translation_description: The capo text used when the capo is 13

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_1
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 1 (except for 11)

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_2
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 2 (except for 12)

string.name: capo_number_ending_in_3
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo is a number ending in 3 (except for 13)

string.name: capo_generic
string.translation_description: The capo text when the capo doesn't meet any of the other criteria

string.name: sort_by
string.translation_description: Formatted string used in conjunction with the following options to display a button to choose what order songs should be sorted by. %s represents one of the options below (e.g. Date Added)

string.name: sort_by_date_added
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs and playlists in - most recent first

string.name: sort_by_popularity
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - most popular first

string.name: sort_by_date_modified
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show playlists in - most recently modified first

string.name: sort_by_artist_name
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs in - artist name, a to z

string.name: sort_by_title
string.translation_description: Used to pick what order to show songs and playlists in - song title, a to z

string.name: message_chord_load_failed
string.translation_description: Error message shown when chord could not be loaded. %s represents the name of the chord that couldn\'t be loaded

resources.string: Couldn\'t load chord \'%s\'. Please check your internet connection.

string.name: message_no_search_results
string.translation_description: Info message shown when there are no results to a search query. This could be due to an internet connection issue.

resources.string: No search results. Revise your query or check your internet connection.

string.name: message_empty_list
string.translation_description: Default info message when there are no items in a list

string.name: message_tab_load_unexpected_error
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a tab couldn\'t be loaded and an unexpected error occurred. %s represents the error message returned by the system.

string.name: message_tab_load_from_playlist_unexpected_error
string.translation_description: Error message shown when we're trying to load a tab from a playlist and an unexpected error occurs.

resources.string: Unexpected error loading tab from playlist.

string.name: message_tab_load_no_internet
string.translation_description: Error message shown when we couldn\'t load a tab due to being disconnected from the internet.

resources.string: No internet access. This tab is not yet saved offline. Please reconnect to the internet and try again.

string.name: message_tab_not_found
string.translation_description: Error message when loading the selected tab from the internet returns a NOT FOUND result. This shouldn\'t happen, so the user is directed to report the issue to the developer.

resources.string: Tab not found. Please report this issue to the developer.

string.name: message_tab_playlist_entry_not_found
string.translation_description: Error message when loading the selected tab (in a playlist) from the internet returns a NOT FOUND result. This shouldn\'t happen, so the user is directed to report the issue to the developer.

resources.string: Playlist entry not found. Please report this issue to the developer.

string.name: message_tab_unavailable_for_legal_reasons
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a tab is unavailable for legal reasons (e.g. a copyright takedown). It may still appear in search results, but the tab itself is not available.

resources.string: This tab has been taken down and is no longer available. This may occur when the copyright holder requests that it be removed.

string.name: message_playlist_import_export_unexpected_error
string.translation_description: Error message shown when an import or export operation failed

resources.string: Unexpected error importing/exporting playlists. Please report this to the developer.

string.name: message_playlist_import_delayed_internet_access
string.translation_description: Informational message shown when playlists have been imported but no internet connection is available to complete the download. The full operation will be completed the next time the app starts up while connected to the internet.

resources.string: No internet connection. Playlist tabs have been added, but won\'t be downloaded until next time you restart the app with internet access.

string.name: message_search_no_internet
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a search is attempted with no internet connection

resources.string: You\'re not connected to the internet.

string.name: message_search_timeout
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a search times out prior to completion

resources.string: Timeout while waiting for search results.

string.name: message_search_unexpected_error
string.translation_description: Error message shown when a search fails with an unexpected problem

string.name: message_search_suggestion_no_internet
string.translation_description: Informational message displayed when additional search suggestions can't be fetched because we're not connected to the internet.

resources.string: You\'re not connected to the internet.

string.name: message_search_suggestion_unexpected_error
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when additional search suggestions can't be loaded because of an unknown/unexpected issue.

resources.string: Unexpected error fetching more search suggestions.

string.name: message_song_creation_success_title
string.translation_description: The title of the success dialog shown when a song was successfully created

string.name: message_song_creation_success_description
string.translation_description: The body of the success dialog shown when a song was successfully created

resources.string: Song created successfully. Continue to create the first tab for this song.

string.name: message_song_creation_failed_title
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when a song couldn't be created due to unfilled required fields

string.name: label_create_song_genre
string.translation_description: The label for the Genre field when creating a new song

string.name: message_artist_name_not_found
string.translation_description: Warning message displayed when creating a new song and the user enters an artist name that doesn't exist yet

resources.string: Are you sure about that? We couldn\'t find a matching artist. This field is case sensitive!

string.name: action_create_artist
string.translation_description: Button text for the override button to allow the user to create a brand new artist if they entered an artist name that doesn't exist yet

string.name: message_error_fetching_artist_id
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when an unexpected error occurs during artist name validation.

resources.string: Whoops! Not sure what happened there... Please send a screenshot of this message to the developer: %s

string.name: message_error_creating_artist
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when an unexpected error occurs while creating a new artist.

string.name: message_error_creating_song
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when an error occurs while creating a song

string.name: message_tab_creation_failed_title
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when a tab couldn't be created due to unfilled required fields

string.name: message_tab_creation_failed_missing_arguments
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when a tab couldn't be created due to unfilled required fields

resources.string: Couldn\'t create tab. Please fill all required fields.

string.name: message_tab_creation_failed
string.translation_description: Error message displayed when a tab couldn't be created due to unknown or other reasons. %s represents the error message returned by the system.

string.name: message_prefilling_tab_failed
string.translation_description: Error message displayed in the tab creation screen when the tab content couldn't be prefilled from the tab ID (e.g. if the user clicked Edit Tab from the tab view, but the tab content couldn't be fetched for some reason). %s represents the error message returned by the system.

string.name: message_tab_creation_success_title
string.translation_description: The title of the success dialog shown when a tab was successfully created

string.name: message_tab_creation_success_description
string.translation_description: The body of the success dialog shown when a tab was successfully created

resources.string: Your tab has been created and added to your favorites. It won\'t be visible in search until moderators approve it, so don\'t remove it from your favorites or you won\'t be able to find it again.

string.name: action_navigate_to_new_tab
string.translation_description: The text of the action button of the success dialog when a new tab is successfully created, that navigates the user to the new tab

string.name: action_create_tab
string.translation_description: The text of the action button of create-tab page to submit the created tab

string.name: action_insert_chord
string.translation_description: The text of the button used to insert a chord into a tab while creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_content
string.translation_description: The label for the Content field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_chord
string.translation_description: The label for the Chord field to specify a chord to insert when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_song_name
string.translation_description: The label for the Song Name field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_artist_name
string.translation_description: The label for the Artist Name field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_version_description
string.translation_description: The label for the Version Description field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_difficulty
string.translation_description: The label for the Difficulty field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_tuning
string.translation_description: The label for the Tuning field when creating a new tab

string.name: label_create_tab_capo
string.translation_description: The label for the Capo field when creating a new tab

string.name: tab_version_abbreviation
string.translation_description: Shortened version number for display in places where space is limited (like in search results)

string.name: tab_favorite_button_accessibility_text
string.translation_description: Accessibility text used for the favorite button
